ygData.subject: Re: A wizards message board?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, EQVault has the Magic Shop message board. Not totally dedicated to wiz s but close. I personally like having this stuff in my mail box. I have my filters
ygData.messageBody:
Well, EQVault has the Magic Shop message board. Not totally dedicated to
wiz's but close.
I personally like having this stuff in my mail box. I have my filters going
and that works great for me.

I got sick of reading the boards since once they get populated it just
takes forever to load.

Just my 2cents.



At 09:07 AM 4/21/99 -0300, you wrote:
>From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
>
>There seems to be enough people to participate in this, would everyone like
>me to setup a wizards message board? Then all the email boxes can breathe
>easy? And we can still ask all the questions we want?
>
>
>It would just be a simple board, using WWWBoard or something like that.
>
>- Paul
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Looking to expand your world?
>http://www.ONElist.com
